subject: Re: QM's embarrassing corrective bloomers

i've got the recipe and am redoing electrotherapeutic innovations of 25 years ago (one of which was the radiant energy device in "THE POWER" and it was also a communications device to several types of "beyond"--all the strange stuff is "of a piece" ). the non gas- discharge variant is running now. it has to run in the same place for 3 days before therapeutic energies appear.  i used it to regrow carl's hair once!  it's identical , in principle, to Moray electrotherapeutic device.
   
  up to date materials; custom , boutique ,fabrication shops; better performing semi-conductors-you could get burned as a witch for using gallium arsenide in FETs before 1980-  all the preceding make a BIG difference, as does the well deserved collapse of QM when applied to anything larger than a medium sized molecule.  professional pomposities will not rubber stamp something that "only" works; that totally kills private investment due to lawsuit paranoia.
   
  i'm going to presume it's ok to put this on EVP site

Iona Miller <iona_m@...> wrote:
    
VERY much of interest! thx.
io
